## BGM2SHP

Creates a shapefile from an Atlantis BGM file. Output is in the same coordinate system as the BGM file.

The java code has been checked into the SVN repository at:

<https://svnserv.csiro.au/svn/atlantis/BGM2SHP>

For most people you should just be able to use the [runnable jar](attachments/43157333.jar)  
To run this via command line type:

java -jar BGM2SHP.jar
